Params: {3: 'Hearing the soldier shout, the people on the frontline look up as fiery red mechanical clusters zip past the cloudy sky.'}
{3: 'The soldiers immediately dispatch troops to shoot at the sky.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Chaofeng Crew, report the casualty count in the city.', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Chaofeng Crew', 3: 'The anti-air artillery intercepts most of the airstrikes, but a small number of Corrupted still manage to slip into the city. The guerrilla forces from the Pulao Crew exchange fire with the advancing Corrupted.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Danhao', 3: 'This is the Bian Crew. Some defense turrets were destroyed during the airstrikes. Requesting backup. Repeat, requesting backup.', 4: '1'}

{3: 'As the defensive barrage falter, the Corrupted on the other side of the bridge advance. They jump off the broken bridge and crumble into pieces from the fall, slowly piling into a path made of mechanical remains.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Defensive line, retreat! Take back the defense turrets!', 4: '1'}
